---

## Column Definitions

| Column | Definition |
|:---|:---|
| **Authority** | PASS = Has frozen header or authority declaration |
| **Schema Ref** | PASS = All claims traceable to schema pointers |
| **Semantic Purity** | PASS = Describing only, no defining |
| **Change Type** | Editorial / Clarifying / Semantic / N/A |
| **Evidence Pointer** | Schema pointer (e.g., `mplp-core.schema.json#/properties/agent_id`) or commit hash or scan report ID |
| **Verdict** | ✅ PASS / ⚠️ REWORD / ❌ REMOVE |
| **Notes** | Remediation details or escalation notes |

---

## Verdict Criteria

| Verdict | Criteria |
|:---|:---|
| ✅ PASS | All columns PASS, ready for freeze |
| ⚠️ REWORD | Phrasing needs adjustment, no semantic change |
| ❌ REMOVE | Unauthorized content, must delete or move |

---

|:---|:---|:---|
| Auditor | | |
| Reviewer | | |
